summary: Fixes for minor non game breaking bugs.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#9900ff][size=4][color=#1155Cc][b][u]_BUGOVISTE[/u][/b][/color]
[/size][/color][font=Georgia]
[size=3]This is mostly (re)position statics - there is only .esp and one fixed mesh.

Use as you wish.

Masters: Skyrim.esm
         Dawnguard.esm
         Hearthfires.esm
         Dragonborn.esm
         Unofficial Skyrim Legendary Edition Patch.esp (ver. 3.05)

Cleaned and sorted with TES5Edit 3.1.3_EXPERIMENTAL
(by ElminsterAU, updated for Skyrim by Hlp, Zilav and Sharlikran - thank you very much!)
______________________________________________________________
[/size][/font]
[font=Georgia][size=3][font=Georgia][size=3][u]New:[/u]  Added content

[/size][/font][size=4]Version 1.1c [/size]for USLEEP 3.0.5

[size=2](Fixes from ver.1.0c are not included in this version as USLEEP 3.0.5. now contain fixes for all bug mantained in ver.1.0c.) [/size]

[color=#1155Cc][u][size=4]Content ver. 1.1c:[/size][/u][/color][size=4]
[/size]

[size=3]Use for any non malevolent intent as you wish.[/size]
No credits needed - now or in the future.[/font]
author: Mizera Mizar

files.name: _Bugoviste_1.1_nopict
files.changelogHtml:
Ver 1.1: New fixes only. Fixes from ver. 1.0c now included-covered in USLEEP 3.0.5.
Ver. 1.0c I removed 1 item ("DLC1Coffin01testjoeltestdeletemetest") from .esp (a mark for still not implemented fix) so it is safe for use in a game. I still don´t recomende do it.
